title: AI-Enhanced Multimodal Writing Education Program to Strengthen English Proficiency and Awareness of Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing skills, foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Task-oriented learning utilizing AI tools and multimodal resources in blended (face-to-face/online) environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete English writing assignments that integrate various formats (infographics, videos, observational records, etc.) using AI tools.
Learners can enhance their English writing skills reflecting ecological awareness through thematic exploration linked to the UN SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals).
Learners can apply strategic revisions and reflective thinking in the writing process using peer feedback and AI analysis tools.

resources: Online AI writing tools (e.g., Grammarly, ChatGPT)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
